"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400de2763687236468c0000#post_5400de2763687236468c0000

Shouldn't the title of the game be a tip? Grand Theft Auto? Stealing cars?


"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400de4763687270be220100#post_5400de4763687270be220100

You have to understand that times were different. Nowadays, a lot of kid's shows and toys are sugarcoated. 



"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400de5163687236af9b0000#post_5400de5163687236af9b0000

I've always been in the minority with this, but I want a ton of kids. Like, four.

Yes, I understand I won't have a life. Yes, I understand that I will be subject to unspeakable horrors. But I'm willing to go down that path.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400dec36368723630ae0000#post_5400dec36368723630ae0000

My mom just had to say one thing. "If you don't stop, we will never come here ever again."

Even if it was just the grocery shop, the thought of not being with my mom everywhere she went freaked me out enough.
